researcherInfoSys

Class KmeansModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • researcherInfoSys.KmeansModel

  • public class KmeansModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to realize K-Means Clustering algorithm, and recommend similar researchers to a specified researcher.
    Author:
    james

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Researcher[] catalog
      A catalog which helps to retrieve researcher conveniently.
      private weka.core.Instances instanceList
      List of all instances retrieved from the Arff file.
      private weka.clusterers.SimpleKMeans KM
      Instance of the K-Means Model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      KmeansModel(int num, Researcher[] catalog)
      Constructor with parameter, constructing a new KmeansModel instance with the number of clusters and a researcher catalog.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void recommend(Researcher owner)
      Recommend and output similar researchers who are in a same cluster with a specified researcher.

    • Field Detail

      • catalog

        private Researcher[] catalog
        A catalog which helps to retrieve researcher conveniently. It stores the corresponding researcher of each index of instance,

      • instanceList

        List of all instances retrieved from the Arff file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KmeansModel

        public KmeansModel(int num,
                   Researcher[] catalog)
        Constructor with parameter, constructing a new KmeansModel instance with the number of clusters and a researcher catalog.
        Parameters:
        num - the specified number of the clusters
        catalog - the catalog which helps to retrieve researcher, it stores the corresponding researcher of each index of instance

    • Method Detail

      • recommend

        public void recommend(Researcher owner)
        Recommend and output similar researchers who are in a same cluster with a specified researcher.
        Parameters:
        owner - the specified researcher needing recommendations
